title: Macbook pro A1278 i5 2011 video problems?
message: I attached a picture. It works normally about 1 hour and then appears as in the attached image. When reboot it works again. Any idea what to check?

title: Macbook pro A1278 i5 2011 video problems?
message: Replace memory modules and try again...

title: Macbook pro A1278 i5 2011 video problems?
message: Either bad RAM or a bad slot.
